short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Togglable option is added below applicable BBC videos, option is saved to local storage. Not affiliated with or created by the BBC.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a togglable larger option below applicable BBC videos, this is useful for larger devices/computers where you don't want to go full screen but want to see a larger view.

The option is saved to local storage, so other videos or revisits will remember your choice.

This extension is not affiliated with or created by the BBC.
Ollie Chalk (https://uk.linkedin.com/pub/oliver-chalk/40/464/584)
